Chapters

In the Bhagavad Gita, there are a total of 18 chapters, out of which 1st to 6th is talk about how one should do his duties and is called Karma Yoga.
The second set of 6 chapters from chapter 7th to 12th is called as Bhakti Yoga.
The third set of 6 chapters from chapter 13th to 18th is called as Jaana Yoga.

Arjuna Visada Yoga

Chapter 1,Verses 47

Sankhya Yoga

Chapter 2,Verses 72

Karma Yoga

Chapter 3,Verses 43

Jnana Karma Sanyasa Yoga

Chapter 4,Verses 42

Karma Sanyasa Yoga

Chapter 5,Verses 29

Dhyana Yoga

Chapter 6,Verses 47

Gyaan Vigyana Yoga

Chapter 7,Verses 30

Akshara Brahma Yoga

Chapter 8,Verses 28

Raja Vidya Yoga

Chapter 9,Verses 34

Vibhooti Yoga

Chapter 10,Verses 42

Vishwaroopa Darshana Yoga

Chapter 11,Verses 55

Bhakti Yoga

Chapter 12,Verses 20

Ksetra Ksetrajna Vibhaaga Yoga

Chapter 13,Verses 35

Gunatraya Vibhaga Yoga

Chapter 14,Verses 27

Purushottama Yoga

Chapter 15,Verses 20

Daivasura Sampad Vibhaga Yoga

Chapter 16,Verses 24

Sraddhatraya Vibhaga Yoga

Chapter 17,Verses 28

Moksha Sanyaas Yoga

Chapter 18,Verses 78
